title: Corner Protest
description: Join us for a recurring protest every Tuesday and Thursday to promote democracy and engage positively. We gather at the corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins to stand against actions we believe are wrong, encouraging everyone to participate and express their views.
meeting_location: SW Corner of Drake and College
raw_text:
Join the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday 3:15-5:15 PM

SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins

Positive engagement

PROTECT DEMOCRACY

Right or Left … we all know this is WRONG!

WE THE PEOPLE

OMG GOP WTF

Thursday, Jan 15, 2026

3:15 - 5:15 pm

2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
raw_summary: The flyer advertises a recurring protest event happening every Tuesday and Thursday from 3:15 PM to 5:15 PM at the SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins. Additional details specify specific sign themes for the protest, and it includes a special mention of an event happening on Thursday, January 15, 2026, at 2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade Overpass Bannering
description: We invite everyone to join us with high-visibility protest signs and flags to stand on the bridge and make a strong statement against attacks on democracy.
address: The Kissing Couple, Percival Landing, Downtown Olympia
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING

17 JANUARY 2026
FROM 12:00 TO 2:00
THE KISSING COUPLE, PERCIVAL LANDING
DOWNTOWN OLYMPIA

BRING YOUR HIGH-VISIBILITY PROTEST SIGNS, FLAGS, &
A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE 
TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!

MORE INFORMATION: OLYMPIA INDIVISIBLE, BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG, AND THEBLOP.ORG
raw_summary: The image announces an event organized by the Olympia Visibility Brigade, focusing on raising awareness through overpass bannering. The event aims at making a statement against attacks on democracy.

title: NOW Is the Time to ACT UP!
description: Join us every Saturday to protest at the corner of Harmony Road and Weitzel. Bring a protest sign or your flag to participate, with extras available if needed. Together, we can make a difference.

title: Stand Up Loveland: Free America Walkout
description: Join us in Loveland for the Free America Walkout. We're gathering on January 20th to make our voices heard. Line up on Highway 34 going East and West of Highway 287.
address: Line highway 34 going East and West of highway 287.
raw_text:
STAND UP
LOVELAND: FREE
AMERICA WALKOUT

STAND UP LOVELAND: FREE AMERICA WALKOUT
January 20th @ 2pm - 4pm
Line highway 34 going East and West of highway 287.
Loveland, Colorado
FIND YOUR LOCAL WALK OUT! https://bit.ly/findawalkout
raw_summary: This flyer announces "Stand Up Loveland: Free America Walkout" scheduled for January 20th from 2 PM to 4 PM. Participants are encouraged to line Highway 34 going east and west of Highway 287 in Loveland, Colorado. The flyer suggests finding local walkouts with a provided link.

title: Women's Day Walk Out Protest
description: Join us for the Women's Day Walk Out Protest as we walk away from fascism and toward a Free America. We aim to fight for a future that belongs to all. Everybody in. Nobody out.
address: George Washington Park Sidewalk on S. Pearl St.
raw_text:
WOMEN’S DAY
Walk Out Protest
January 20th 2 PM - 3 PM
George Washington Park Sidewalk on S. Pearl St.
Centralia, Washington
We walk away from fascism.
We walk toward a Free America.
We fight for a future that belongs to all of us.
Everybody in. Nobody out.
Organized by lewislocallodger.blogspot.com
raw_summary: A protest event titled 'Women's Day Walk Out Protest' is happening on January 20th from 2 PM to 3 PM at George Washington Park Sidewalk, Centralia, Washington. The event promotes walking away from fascism and fighting for a free America. It is organized by a blog site.

title: Not My President's Day
description: Join us at the Allen County Courthouse for a protest against the current political leadership. Stand up for democracy and defend the constitution. Let your voice be heard against authoritarian tendencies.
raw_text: NOT MY PRESIDENT'S DAY Democracy EGO Don't forget to censor Fed up with wannabe king and dictator? COME PROTEST WITH US! FEBRUARY 16 ALLEN COUNTY COURTHOUSE 3-5 PM Tell your friends! Don't let it be their little Secret! DEFEND THE CONSTITUTION Not Fit to lead HE MAY HOLD THE OFFICE... ...BUT WE WISH HE WASN'T PRESIDENT.
raw_summary: The image is a protest flyer for an event titled 'Not My President's Day'. It shows a satirical representation of a political figure. The event encourages people to protest at the Allen County Courthouse on February 16 from 3-5 PM, promoting the defense of the constitution.

title: The Big Beautiful Boo
description: We are organizing a nationwide synchronized protest called "The Big Beautiful Boo" where citizens will make noise from their homes at 8:00 PM EST on April 15th. This is a safe, easy way to protest without marching or needing permits.
raw_text:
THE BIG BEAUTIFUL BOO
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 15TH
8:00PM EST- ZERO HOUR

A Nationwide Synchronized Protest

WHEN WE'RE LOUD TOGETHER
THEY CAN'T IGNORE US

*No Marching, No Permits, No Travel*

A Safe & Easy Way To Protest From Home

On WEDNESDAY, APRIL 15TH, 8pm. EST Citizens across the country will step onto their porches
, balconies, and roofs to let out a collective "Boo" and make a ruckus. It is a low-risk, high-impact way
for the "silent majority" to become the "loud majority" without needing to march or face confrontation.

More Info: www.bbbboo.info
raw_summary: The image advertises a nationwide synchronized protest called "The Big Beautiful Boo," scheduled for April 15th at 8:00 PM EST. It encourages people to make noise from their homes instead of marching, representing a low-risk protest method. More information can be found on the website provided.
